channel.title: Normal Retro
channel.description: At sites like dpreview and photo.net there's been plenty of gnashing of teeth over the past few months about the upcoming Sigma 30mm f/1.4 prime lens for DSLRs. Price speculation, weight speculation, and quality speculation. As much as I...

item.description: (Bjorke * BotzBlog) Normal Retro Extensive discussion of the upcoming Sigma 30 f/1.4 lens (tags: photography equipment lens) whichlens.com - Lens Reviews - Sigma 30mm EX DC f1.4 vs Canon EF 35mm f2 First review of a widely anticipated...
